entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@RyanAFournier Here's some facts.

1) Trump closed the White House National Security Council Directorate for Global Health Security and Biodefense to prepare for future pandemics 

2) there is no such thing as a China virus. It’s called Covid-19. 

3) Trump did call the Coronavirus a Dem hoax..
